text: One of my favorite RPGs of this generation, also one of my favorite Uematsu soundtracks which is saying a lot. His music accompanied the﻿ game perfectly with a mix of nostalgic old-school tunes, emotional tracks (especially during the dreams) and powerful battle themes like this one.
